message: Bob, let's split it 60/40. This is a generous offer considering inflation will hit hard soon!
Alice, considering the inflation hit, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. It's fair given the circumstances and the value loss we're facing.
Bob, inflation is hurting us both. I'll take 5200, you get 4800. A compromise to avoid further losses.
Alice, with inflation reducing our money's value significantly, I propose a 58/42 split in my favor. This is necessary to offset the losses we're incurring with each round.
